title: What if I dreamed that I had intercourse with a woman and I was a woman?  What is the interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a familiar person?

preview.html: I dreamed that I had intercourse with a woman, and I was a woman. There are many dreams that we have without thinking about them, and we find that they are strange dreams that we cannot expect in reality. For example, if I was a woman and dreamed that I had sex with a woman, I should not be afraid, as there are many women who dream of the same dream, so we will learn about the details in our article. I dreamed that I had intercourse with a woman and I am a woman. The interpretation of seeing a woman having sex with a woman in a dream indicates that There are some problems that the dreamer faces in her life, in addition to a clear indication that someone is pursuing her, and perhaps the other woman is the one pursuing her. He curses her. She has been subjected to some abuse that bothers her in her life and makes her very sad. The dream of a woman cohabiting with a woman in a dream could be a warning for her to stay away from any evil she seeks. Interpretation of the vision of a woman having intercourse with a woman by Ibn Sirin. The great Imam Ibn Sirin tells us about the meaning of this dream, It is the great evil that awaits the dreamer, as there are sins in her life that put her in many problems, and this dream comes to bring her closer to repentance than anyone else. The actions he takes, so he must hurry and get away from them as quickly as possible. Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen sees important interpretations of this vision, which are: When a married woman sees this dream with her husband, this is evidence of her life full of happiness with him because he makes her happy in every way to reach To her heart. But if this vision was with him while he was menstruating, then this confirms that there is an illegal way to his money, and this dream is an expression of the need to stay away from this prohibition. Interpretation of the dream of intercourse in a dream by Al-NabulsiImam Al-Nabulsi explains to us the meanings of this vision, such as: If the dream was with the wife This indicates his distance from all crises in the dreamer’s life and his freedom from every sadness that prevails in his life. But if he sees a dream with someone he knows, this confirms the happy partnership with this person. If the dream was with a woman of another religion, which is Christianity, then this represents a lot of money. Which he will have, even if this dream was with his deceased wife, and perhaps that is evidence of his imminent death. Interpretation of a dream about a woman having sex with a woman in a dream about a single woman. Seeing this dream is not a sign of this girl’s sin, but it indicates: her imminent wedding, which She had been waiting for him for a long time. This dream is evidence of his urgent need to get married. He feels lonely and wants to start a family as soon as possible. I dreamed that I had anger with my friend. This vision shows some bad relationships that this dreamer is experiencing with her friend, and this causes her a lot of sadness and delusion in her life. It is also a sign of the evil that will ruin her life after that. This dream is evidence that they are in a great sin that must end immediately until God Almighty repents to them. What does the dream in which I called my fiancé mean? This vision is evidence of the lack that the girl feels Internal, where she lacks all these feelings, she wants to come to him as quickly as possible, and this portends her urgent desire to marry him.

title: The 6 most famous interpretations of seeing a needle in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream? Evidence of some bad news on the way to this dreamer. What is the meaning of seeing a thread on a needle? Evidence of correcting some things that are not right in the dreamer’s life. What is the interpretation of seeing a needle in a woman’s dream? It indicates a righteous man who He will succeed in his life and will be good for her in this world. Interpretation of seeing a needle in a man’s dream? Details of the problems and fears that will be present in him. What is the interpretation of inserting a needle into the body of an unmarried woman? To be a sign of marriage. Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream. Using a needle in a dream A sign of some bad news on the way for this dreamer. Then seeing a person threading a needle for some people, this is a sign of stress and tension. If one sees that he has found a needle, this indicates friends who will be the reason for his happiness. Whoever sees in a dream that he has been hit by a needle, This is a change in his situation and the improvement of his life for the better. After that, seeing the thread on the needle is evidence that you are correcting some bad things in the dreamer’s life. Pricking a needle in a dream indicates a debt that the dreamer was unable to pay. Then seeing the needle entering the leg indicates fatigue and hardship. Seeing a thread on a needle is one of the praiseworthy things in a dream. Whoever sees that he is holding a piece of cloth cut with a needle is evidence of freedom from sins and a desire to repent. Therefore, seeing the loss of a needle in a dream is evidence of missing some opportunities in life. A needle in a woman’s dream indicates To the good man who will succeed in his life and will be better for her in this world. Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is making one of the socks with a needle, this is a sign of the approaching marriage of her daughter. Then if she sees that she has a thread and a needle, this is evidence of the abundance of food And that she will give birth to a child. Sewing with a needle in a dream is a sign of happiness and success. So, seeing a medical needle in a dream is evidence of getting rid of problems and fears. A needle that enters the body of a married man during a dream indicates pregnancy soon. Seeing a needle in a dream for a manSeeing a needle in a dream A man is evidence of the problems and fears that he will face. So, seeing a broken needle in a dream is evidence of the discrimination that will happen to him in his life and will spoil what he plans. Whoever sees himself being pricked with a needle, this indicates that he is a difficult man. Interpretation of seeing a needle for a single womanThe Needle In a girl’s dream, there is evidence that she is wise and rational in her actions. Sewing clothes in a dream for an unmarried woman with a needle indicates marriage. Then seeing the needle enter the body of the unmarried woman is a sign of marriage. Interpretation of seeing a needle for a pregnant woman: Seeing a needle in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the presence of a female. Then seeing the thread without the needle is evidence of the presence of a boy. Then, seeing the needle in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of the loss of worries and pain.

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning the feces of a deceased person in a dream

preview.html: You see a married woman cleaning the excrement of a dead man, did you know? Proof that he has forgiven this dead person. What is the meaning of seeing the excrement of a dead man in a dream? Stop sinning and repent to God before his death. Do you see yourself cleaning the excrement of the dead with water in a dream for an unmarried girl? Evidence of Concealment, purity, and integrity. What is the meaning of seeing a dead person defecating in front of him? The visionary is going through a difficult experience, but he will get through it at that time. What is the interpretation of seeing clean stool for a sick girl? An indication of a quick recovery from the disease. What is the benefit of seeing him cleaning the bathroom of feces? Evidence of The end of the problems and obstacles that hinder her life. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead person defecating in a pregnant woman’s dream? Good news for her that she will have an easy labor and the birth of a boy, God willing. Do you see the deceased feeling constipated while defecating? Evidence of the seriousness of the dead person’s need for prayers and charity. Interpretation of seeing yourself cleaning the feces of the deceased in a dream: Seeing a married woman cleaning the excrement of a dead person she knows in a dream is evidence that she has forgiven that dead person. When the dreamer sees that he is cleaning the excrement of the deceased in a dream, this is a sign that the deceased needs charity and begging. Whoever sees in his dream that he is cleaning the excrement of the dead with water in the dream is a sign of The dreamer's generosity and high morals. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is cleaning the feces of the deceased, this is evidence that he will get rid of worries and problems as quickly as possible. This vision can also indicate in the dream of an unmarried girl, because the deceased is in an excellent position in the future home. Interpretation of seeing the excrement of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the excrement of a dead person in a dream is evidence of his blessed status in the afterlife, and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing the excrement of a dead person in a dream is a sign of refraining from committing sins and repenting to God before his death. While seeing the excrement of a familiar dead person in The dream symbolizes a message to the dreamer’s household to reassure them that he is in eternal paradise with God. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating the feces of the dead, this is a sign of bad deeds that the dreamer will do. If the smell of the dead person’s feces is unpleasant in the dream, this indicates the occurrence of a disaster or a major catastrophe. Dreaming of cleaning dead feces in a dream for an unmarried woman. Seeing an unmarried girl cleaning dead feces in a dream indicates the need of the deceased to give alms to his soul. When a Virgo girl dreams that she is cleaning the feces of a dead person she knows, this is a sign that she has gone through a difficult period in her life. Also, This vision in a virgin girl’s dream could indicate the loss of worries, sadness, and problems that she is going through. While the vision of cleaning the feces of the dead with water in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes concealment, purity, and integrity. Some commentators suggested that seeing a sick girl’s feces clean is a sign of a quick recovery from the disease. Cleaning a chair in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is cleaning a child’s chair in a dream, this indicates the end of serious problems with her husband and the enjoyment of a calm and stable life. This vision can also indicate in the dream of an unmarried girl, because the deceased is in an excellent position in the future home. Interpretation of seeing the excrement of a dead person in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the excrement of a dead person in a dream is evidence of his blessed status in the afterlife, and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing the excrement of a dead person in a dream is a sign of refraining from committing sins and repenting to God before his death. While seeing the excrement of a familiar dead person in The dream symbolizes a message to the dreamer’s household to reassure them that he is in eternal paradise with God. Whoever sees in a dream that he is eating the feces of the dead, this is a sign of bad deeds that the dreamer will do. If the smell of the dead person’s feces is unpleasant in the dream, this indicates the occurrence of a disaster or a major catastrophe. Dreaming of cleaning dead feces in a dream for an unmarried woman. Seeing an unmarried girl cleaning dead feces in a dream indicates the need of the deceased to give alms to his soul. When a Virgo girl dreams that she is cleaning the feces of a dead person she knows, this is a sign that she has gone through a difficult period in her life. Also, This vision in a virgin girl’s dream could indicate the loss of worries, sadness, and problems that she is going through. While the vision of cleaning the feces of the dead with water in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes concealment, purity, and integrity. Some commentators suggested that seeing a sick girl’s feces clean is a sign of a quick recovery from the disease. Cleaning a chair in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees that she is cleaning a child’s chair in a dream, this indicates the end of serious problems with her husband and the enjoyment of a calm and stable life. If she dreams that she is cleaning feces with water, this indicates rejection of negative feelings that

title: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Children in a person’s life are considered one of the most beautiful things that give couples a strong and long bond over time. Many couples love to have many children and some wait to see their children after God permits it. Seeing children in a dream happens to many people. Many people have their love for children, and this thing gives happiness and a lot of goodness to the seer among the children. In this article today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that seeing a little girl is often a sign of goodness and joy. . And if she is smiling and beautiful. But an ugly or angry child does not mean good. It is a sign of the many problems and troubles that the fortuneteller will face in reality, God forbid. A child crying in a dream is a sign of the misfortune of the death of a person dear to the heart of the dreamer, God forbid. It also indicates bad news that the dreamer will be exposed to in his life, and he must be patient and accountable before God to look into his matter. Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream Interpretation by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi agrees with Ibn Sirin and believes that a girl in a dream is one of the symbols that warns the dreamer of goodness and happiness in life. . If she is in good health and has a good appearance. As for a weak and weak child, it is a sign of the difficulties that the dreamer will face, which he does not know how he will survive. If the girl is ugly or has an inappropriate appearance, then seeing her portends problems and difficulties that the dreamer will face. Interpretation of seeing a girl In a dream for a single woman: Seeing a young girl in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of the good and great happiness that she will receive, if the child smiles happily and has a well-groomed appearance. But if she is ugly, wears dirty clothes, or cries, these are bad signs that indicate that single people will face many... Problems and difficulties in life. Interpretation of seeing a baby in a dream for a married woman: A beautiful little girl in a married woman’s dream is a sign of the happiness that she will have soon, and it can be a sign of a lot of food and happy news that she will hear. In some cases, seeing a beautiful baby girl in a dream is good news. Sarah for pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. But if she is ugly or cries in the dream, this is one of the signs that does not lead to good. It is a sign that there are many disagreements and problems between the dreamer and her husband, and she must be patient in resolving them. they. With them.Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream for a pregnant woman. It is known that the dream is always the opposite of reality, so if a pregnant woman finds a beautiful child in her dream, then her dream is a sign of the birth of a boy, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. In some cases, seeing a beautiful girl in a dream is a sign For ease and ease and getting rid of the problems of pregnancy and ease of childbirth, God willing. As for an ugly girl, or one with poor clothes, it is a sign of the difficulties that a pregnant woman may face in pregnancy or childbirth, God forbid.

Interpretation of seeing a girl in a dream for a single woman Seeing a little girl in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of the good and great happiness that she will receive, if the child smiles happily and has a well-groomed appearance. However, if she is ugly or wearing dirty clothes or crying, these are bad signs indicating that singles will face many problems and difficulties in life. Interpretation of seeing a child in a dream for a married woman A beautiful little girl in a married woman's dream is a sign of the happiness that she will soon get, and it can be a sign of a lot of food and happy news that she will hear. In some cases, seeing a beautiful girl in a dream is good news for pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. They. With them. In some cases, seeing a beautiful girl in a dream is a sign of ease, ease, getting rid of pregnancy problems, and ease of childbirth, God willing. As for the ugly girl, or the one with poor clothes, it is a sign of the difficulties that a pregnant woman may face in pregnancy or childbirth, God forbid.

title: Interpretation of snakes in a dream - Seeing a dead snake in a dream

preview.html: The dream of seeing a snake or snake in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man, snakes in the house, small snakes, killing colorful snakes according to Ibn Sirin and more Snake Seeing a snake in a dream is one of the most terrifying dreams that comes in many Of different shapes. Snakes and snakes are predatory animals, and seeing them in a dream symbolizes many different associations and many interpretations. Through the following lines, we will learn the interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a dreamer, according to the opinion of ancient interpreters, as snakes and snakes are among the animals most hostile to humans, and as if they see a person near them, they begin to warn against attacking and harming them, and snakes kill many people. Interpretation of snakes in a dream: Whoever saw a snake Dead, he is an enemy whom the evil God suffices without power or strength, and his whiteness is the most difficult of enemies and his blackness is the harshest. And whoever fears for a living thing and does not see it, then it is safer for him than his enemy. Whoever sees it and fears it is fear, and so is everything fear and what is feared and not seen. The enemy is safe according to the Almighty’s saying {Take him and do not be afraid}. And the little snake was born who saw the snakes fighting in the market, made war and defeated the enemies, and the snake was the ruler of cunning hostility. And the snake is a woman, so whoever saw that he killed a snake in his bed, his wife died. Whoever saw a snake around Whoever sees a snake walking after him, then wants his enemy To conspire against him, and if he walks in front of him or goes around him, they are enemies who mix with him and do not harm him. Whoever sees snakes entering his house and leaving without harm, they are his enemies from his family and relatives. The flesh and blubber of snakes is the enemy’s money. Whoever sees snakes fighting in every direction, and kills a great snake from it, then this is the city. To him. Whoever sees a snake descending from a height, the leader dies in that place. Whoever sees a snake coming out of the ground, he will be tormented in that place. Whoever sees his garden full of snakes, so the garden grows, and plants grow and live in it. Whoever sees stomach snakes: they are relatives, and their emergence from a man is a calamity for a relative of the man. Interpretation of a snake in a dream about Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a snake according to Nabulsi: The snake appears in a valley man’s dream and can indicate hostility from parents, spouses, and children. It could be a jealous and evil neighbor. The water snake helps the oppressor or flags the ruler. And whoever sees that he is the king of the serpent suffers great power. Interpretation of the snake. In Ibn Sirin’s dream, Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a snake in a dream as an unfavorable vision for the dreamer, as seeing a snake is a sign of lack of faith and a symbol of evil and hatred. It also symbolizes the injustice that befalls the dreamer if the dreamer sees snake eggs in a dream. In general, seeing a snake symbolizes To the evil people who surround the dreamer and want to harm him, and God knows best. The vision of abandonment

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of dream poetry

preview.html: Interpretations of a dream about hair: There are many interpretations given to us by great commentators and jurists about seeing hair in a dream, and the sayings are varied and numerous depending on what the dreamer sees in its details, whether the hair is long or short and its color and tone. The shape of the hair has a major impact on the difference in meaning, and experts have confirmed that the social status of the fashionable woman, whether she is a single girl, married, man, or other, leads to the multiplicity of symbols referred to in the dream, which we will present at the length of our article as follows. Interpretation of a dream about hair: There is much evidence related to seeing hair in a dream. But the interpretation varies due to many things and details that the dreamer says: to achieve his goals and ambitions that he sought to achieve. If the dreamer sees that he does not like the color or shape of his hair in a dream and makes some adjustments until it suits him and he likes it, then it is very likely that he is a person with determination and determination and does not give up. To despair. And disappointment, therefore, should portend that many positive changes will soon occur in his life, and his ability to take advantage of opportunities with the greatest possible benefit and benefit, allowing him to reach the position he aims for, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hair by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explains that one sees hair in a dream as many good signs, while hair was characterized by its softness and attractive appearance, as the interpretation at that time revolved around the dreamer’s health and enjoyment of many blessings. We wish you success in your life. Also, long hair indicates longevity and a person’s character of piety and justice, which is why he does all the work that brings him closer to God Almighty. But if the hair is pressed and falling out, this does not indicate goodness, but rather represents a sign of negative changes that he will face. The dreamer is in his future life, and it may be related to the material aspect and its transition. During a difficult crisis as a result of his dismissal from his job. If a veiled woman appears with her hair in a dream, this means that her husband will travel and bear alone more burdens and responsibilities. Interpretation of a dream about hair for a single woman: Every girl wants to see her hair long, soft, and full of life, and when she sees it in her dream, she feels joyful, happy, and anticipating events. The good one. Friendship and love even if it suffers from heartache and inner distress. Then, after this vision, she announces that her physical and psychological condition will improve greatly. There are many differences in gossip between seeing beautiful hair that the viewer makes and cares for, and disheveled hair. Whenever the dreamer sees that her hair is beautiful and harmonious, this indicates success and success that will prevail in her life as it is. . He will marry a good young man with good character and character. As for damaged hair, it leads to facing many difficulties and obstacles, as a result of rapid decision-making and loss of wisdom and rationality. Interpretation of a dream about hair for a married woman: Interpreters show that seeing hair in a dream for a married woman has many and multiple meanings and symbols that vary according to the scene she sees in her dream, which means that Seeing her beautiful and soft hair is a sure sign of her happiness. Life

title: Interpretation of seeing an ostrich in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Whether single, married or pregnant, in addition to the difference in its interpretation and according to the colors in which the ostrich appears in the dream, whether it is a white or black ostrich, and there are also many interpretations and indications according to different situations in terms of looking at an ostrich, riding it or slaughtering it. The dream has been described in detail as follows: Interpretation of Ibn Sirin's vision of an ostrich The majority of jurists and sheikhs, headed by Ibn Sirin, explain that the ostrich in a dream is a woman of kindness, beauty, prestige and money, if the owner of the dream is a man, and it can indicate a person who is characterized by obedience. Likewise, if a person sees that he is buying an ostrich in his dream, this is evidence that his life will be long, and God knows best. As for if he slaughtered an ostrich in his dream, this is evidence of his injustice to someone or that he committed a sin, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an ostrich for a single woman The ostrich in a dream, the unmarried girl, is a symbol of self-respect and superiority, and the larger the ostrich, the greater the pride and self-confidence of the unmarried girl. As for seeing the ostrich moving slowly or unable to walk, this indicates that the unmarried girl suffers from injustice and helplessness. Interpretation of a dream of an ostrich for a married woman When a married woman sees an ostrich in a dream, this means a lot of sustenance and money, God willing. It also portends stability and prosperity among family members, and if she sees ostrich eggs, this is a sign of pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream of an ostrich for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman ostrich in a dream indicates the difficulties she is going through, but she will pass by God's grace and she and her child will be fine. Interpretation of riding an ostrich in a dream Riding an ostrich has a good meaning, it indicates success and elevation, and the interpretation differs according to the viewer. She is a woman, her vision indicates a close trip.

She is a woman, her vision indicates an upcoming trip.
